name: Pigeon Tale
description:
When you visit your grandpa in the hospital, he asks you to take care of an injured pigeon he has taken under his wing while it recovers. It has entered the attic, where your grandpa first found it when it crashed through a window. What will you find in this memory-filled attic while you try to clear a path for the pigeon?

Learn more about the grandpa through environmental storytelling while you help a little pigeon get across the attic. Interact with objects and understand the narrative of what the grandpa's life has been like.

Created during IndieCade's 2023 Hidden Heroes game jam.

Controls:

WASD (or arrows) -  Move camera
Z - press Z to focus on the cute pigeon
Clic - click on different items to interact with them

UPDATE: Unfortunately Fungus bugs did not enables us to add dialogue for the narrative items. Every item you "grab" to look at, should have a text, but not at this time. Technically speaking, the game experience is incomplete.
